attributes.action: Allow the Red Arrows to put on an air display at the Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should be proud of our achievements, not ruled by Political Correctness which seems to govern so much of what used to make us proud to be British, and stops such a great deal of what used to be British common sense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
